title: Rockstar Changes Course - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.06.19
description:
Get your trial month of Hims for just $5 today http://forhims.com/GAMESDAILY.

Go to http://buyraycon.com/KFGAMES to get 15% off your order!

Rico from http://www.geekoholics.com joins Greg to talk about Rockstar changing how it treats contractors, the industry's response to Trump, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:05:40 - Housekeeping
We’re going to the Canadian National Exhibition in Toronto next week! August 16-18, Greg, Tim, and Andy will be hosting two panels a day in the Gaming Garage! kindafunny.com/events
The 4th annual Kinda Funny Extra Life T-shirt Contest: kindafunny.com/elcontest
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:07:04 - Things are better at Rockstar
00:12:33 - “Is this a sign of a lasting change for Rockstar?” - The 5 Star Man
00:15:43 - Industry Responds to Trump’s attack
00:23:03 - More Ooblet Fallout
00:32:06 - Gamescom Announcements
00:36:56 - Japan's 1st esports tournament for disabled to be held in August
00:40:41 - Out today
00:46:56 -  Hims
00:48:24 - Raycon
Reader mail   -
00:49:31 - “Do you think Sony will be doing a PlayStation Experience in December?” - Hyrum Reed
00:59:48 - Squad Up: John - PSN - JTown465
01:00:53 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Whitta
